Package gov.nasa.worldwindx.examples.lineofsight

Examples of how to perform line of sight calculations in WorldWind.

Package gov.nasa.worldwindx.examples.lineofsight Description

Examples of how to perform line of sight calculations in WorldWind.

Line of sight calculations can use both terrain data and shapes. LinesOfSight shows how to find points that have line of sight to a given position. It is also possible to determine the intersection of a shape and an arbitrary line. AbstractShapeIntersection is an example of this type of calculation.
